title: AirBnB’s 1st Class (White) Flights, Trump’s Fake Antifa Airlines 9.2.20
itunes:title: AirBnB’s 1st Class (White) Flights, Trump’s Fake Antifa Airlines 9.2.20
description:
In episode 707, Jack and guest host Scam Goddess Laci Mosley are joined by comedian Maggie Maye to discuss Brandy versus Monica's Verzuz, Trump's Laura Ingraham interview, Trump possibly having had a stroke, privileged people leaving big cities for more isolated locations, FDA asking people to not drink hand sanitizer, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Brandy and Monica’s Verzuz Battle: Here’s What Happened
  2. Trump's 'plane loaded with thugs' conspiracy theory matches months-old rumor
  3. Trump's Physician Denies President Had a Stroke in November
  4. Real Estate Is Now About Location, Location, Isolation
  5. The Privileged Have Entered Their Escape Pods
  6. FDA: Uh, please do not drink hand sanitizer?
  7. WATCH: Skip Marley - That's Not True ft. Damian "Jr. Gong" Marley

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
